scripts.commit: git add . && git commit -m "Deploy" && git push
scripts.local-backend: cd server && go build -o server.exe && server.exe
scripts.deploy-all-x: npm-run-all commit deploy-dev deploy-prod backup-firestore-dev backup-firestore-prod
scripts.deploy-prod: concurrently "npm run deploy-frontend-prod" "npm run deploy-backend" "npm run heroku-logs" "npm run deploy-serverless"
scripts.deploy-backend: cd server && godep save ./... & git add . & git commit -m "Deploy" && git push heroku master & cd .. & npm run heroku-logs
scripts.deploy-frontend-dev: cross-var "cd client && yarn build && firebase use $npm_package_config_servernamedev && firebase deploy"
scripts.deploy-frontend-prod: cross-var "cd client && yarn build && firebase use $npm_package_config_servernameprod && firebase deploy"
scripts.deploy-serverless: cd serverless/functions/ && npm run setup && firebase deploy --only functions --debug && cd ..
scripts.heroku-backend-refresh-dev: cross-var "cd server & heroku git:remote -a cavalry-app-dev & heroku apps:destroy --app $npm_package_config_servernamedev --confirm $npm_package_config_servernamedev & git init & git add . & heroku create $npm_package_config_servernamedev & cd .."
scripts.heroku-backend-refresh-prod: cross-var "cd server & heroku git:remote -a cavalry-app-prod & heroku apps:destroy --app $npm_package_config_servernameprod --confirm $npm_package_config_servernameprod & git init & git add . & heroku create $npm_package_config_servernameprod & cd .."
scripts.heroku-logs: cd server && heroku logs -a cavalry-app --tail && cd ..
